this_title: Bach: The Well-tempered Clavier I & II
introduction: In Februay 2009, to mark the 250th anniversary of Bach's death, 4 pianists - Hewitt, MacGregor, Demidenko, Gavrilov- collaborated on a very special project. Each played 12 Preludes and Fugues from The Well-Tempered Clavier, at one of 4 charming venues.
chinese_title: Bach: The Well-tempered Clavier I & II
